LightningComponentBundle.description: Upload an Excel file to a record and extract data to specific fields in the record

property.name: field1
property.label: Record Field 1
property.description: Pick a record field to be filled from the Excel Cell

property.name: address1
property.label: Excel Address 1
property.description: Specify cell address in Excel file, e.g., 'A1' (uses first worksheet) or 'Sheet1!A1'
